panels.visual: Wide shot of Wei's stark chamber - bare of ornament, lit by a single oil lamp. The eunuch Wei sits behind a simple desk, shadows pooling around him. Lueduo stands before him, caught. The lamp flame is the only movement in absolute stillness.
panels.dialogue: Wei: "You have been busy. Minister Chen's daughter. General Wu's wife. The shipping records. Prince Hui's gambling debts."

panels.visual: Close-up of Wei leaning forward, his eyes glittering in the lamplight. His smile is thin as a blade. Power radiates from his stillness. He is a spider at the center of an invisible web.
panels.dialogue: Wei: "You thought no one noticed. I notice everything. It is what I do."

panels.visual: Lueduo kneeling before Wei, head bowed in submission. The single lamp casts their shadows long across the bare floor. A new alliance is forged in shadow.
panels.narration: What Wei offered was infrastructure. Direction. Protection.
